In DreamsGate we want to implement Sci-fi universes , not one, but all . But in the early development all started with the love of the series StarGate. And according to the project, we would like to first of all realize the analog universe SG- 1 , Atlantis , and so on. In the universe as a character you will be able to very much, develop, build their own : village , city, empire , collect resources , not in person (except that in the initial stages ), and with the army of bots . Manage different land, air , and of course space technology as a game plan is a unique system of destruction .

Not quite unimportant detail is the fact that the plan is to integrate the Ingame editor of any objects (objects) and the transfer of data to all users after the approval of the administration file . And right now, there is an opportunity to create maps and this does not need to have a lot of knowledge in the different 3D reactors , but rather be able to deal with cubes in minecraft, but do not dwell on the primitive , and use many additional features .

And it all online .

The only obstacle to the realization of planned it that all game as well as two years ago, making just one person "Roman Vereshchagin ," and he needed any help just as designers, artists and ordinary fans to test all of this with great the crowd on the network. Everyone who has ever visited our website we will be grateful , and to those who will tell their friends (for fans of science fiction and games) for us, we are doubly grateful
